statements: UPDATE PestControl SET control_method = 'Chemical spray', recommended_practices = 'Use protective gear' WHERE pest_name = 'Rats'
UPDATE PestControl SET recommended_practices = 'Set traps in affected areas', control_method = 'Physical barriers' WHERE pest_name = 'Mice'
UPDATE PestControl SET control_method = 'Chemical spray', recommended_practices = 'Use approved chemicals only' WHERE pest_name = 'Termites' AND id = 1
UPDATE PestControl SET recommended_practices = 'Use natural predators' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE pest_control SET pest_name = 'Cockroach', control_method = 'Chemical Spray' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE disease_management SET prevention_method = 'Vaccination', management_method = 'Medication' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE pest_control SET control_method = 'Chemical Spray', best_practice = 'Regular inspection and treatment' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE disease_management SET prevention_method = 'Maintain proper sanitation and hygiene', management_method = 'Medication therapy' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE pest_control SET control_method='Biological Control', effectiveness=0.9 WHERE pest_name='Aphids';
UPDATE best_practices SET category='Sustainable', description='Implement integrated pest management practices' WHERE practice_name='IPM';
UPDATE pest_control SET effectiveness = 0.85, pest_name = 'Cockroaches' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE disease_management SET management_strategy = 'Biological Control' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE pest_management_practices SET pest_name='Weed Control' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE disease_management_practices SET prevention_measures='Proper sanitation and hygiene practices' WHERE disease_name='Fungal Disease';
UPDATE pest_management_practices SET recommended_products = 'Organic pesticides, Neem oil' WHERE pest_name = 'Aphids';
UPDATE extension_workers SET location = 'Field Office' WHERE designation = 'Field Officer';
UPDATE PestControlBestPractices SET recommended_product = 'Eco-Friendly Spray' WHERE pest_name = 'Caterpillars';
UPDATE Farmers SET location = 'North Field' WHERE farmer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE PestControlBestPractices SET control_method = 'Biological control', recommended_product = 'Organic spray' WHERE pest_name = 'Aphids';
UPDATE Farmers SET location = 'New Farm, CA', contact_number = '555-123-4567' WHERE farmer_name = 'John Doe';
